data.persona: I am a place that is a dwelling for many inhabitants. I have a lot of different buildings and centers for different activities or purposes. I am constantly growing as my inhabitant's population also grows.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from wood. It has a huge window in the front and has many rows of items in it. It has no lights but due to the window is well lit.
There's a row and an a huge window in the front here.
The man woman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to welcome the man woman to the bazaar
data.mid_motivation: I hope to sell a lot to the man woman
data.long_motivation: I hope to make a lot of profit during this weeks of the bazaar

timeline.action: give Rare items to Man woman
